replies.body: Did you just admit to account sharing?

nah he wanted to check out how oce is diffrent from NA
still account sharing, still against the ToS, still permabannable
but im just trying to be nice :c and tell him that oce is better than na and i dont play on my weak account so i just gave it to him not sharing

ROFL
In norms its fine but rank is really gonna be a problem
dw i let him have the account so cause he didnt want to start from scratch and i had a account that i didnt need anymore
dont call me stupid cos i am :c

Just a reminder that account sharing in any form, is against the TOS and is a bannable offense. 

If you're trying to get the sometimes elusive lv 7 mastery, just keep trying to play your best. Eventually you'll get there. :)
